content.title: Words as Gods and Demons
content.summary: Reflection on words as the sole creators and destroyers, shaped by their formation and stories, with no faith—only questions driving thought.

philosophy.description: Words build worlds or break ‘em, dependin’ on how they’re formed and the tales they tell. No faith in faith, just questionin’ the source of thought.
philosophy.implication: Guides the Ascension Grid to prioritize raw inquiry over dogma, fuelin’ Memory Crystals with truth.
